T                    =: variable_friction    # (method for setting variable friction) 
4                    =: friction_index       # ('(Index into aux array ', '- fortran indexing)') 

1                    =: num_friction_regions # (Friction Regions) 

-100.0 9             =: lower               
-28.0 2.0            =: upper               
inf 0.0 -inf         =: depths              
0.03 0.022           =: manning_coefficients

0                    =: num_friction_files
